name: Red Stake
effect: Small Blind gives no reward money

name: Green Stake
effect: Required score scales faster for each Ante

name: Black Stake
effect: 30% chance for Jokers in shops or booster packs to have an Eternal sticker (Can't be sold or destroyed)

name: Purple Stake
effect: Required score scales even faster for each Ante

name: Orange Stake
effect: 30% chance for Jokers in shops or booster packs to have a Perishable sticker (Debuffed after 5 Rounds)

name: Gold Stake
effect: 30% chance for Jokers in shops or booster packs to have a Rental sticker (Costs 3 per round, can be bought for 1). The first Soul card in a Gold seed will give a Legendary Joker that doesn't yet have a Gold Sticker, which will help with the Completionist++ achievement.
